channel.title: ..::Idea::
channel.description:
I am fairly new to this section of Moparisthebest (If you know what I mean, I mostly spend me time in Server Development). But, I have and idea, that I suppose is a "noob" idea to you guys because I bet this idea has been thought up before and not worked. Please do not get mad If it has infact been tried, I have not been around that long (at least in this section).
Your items and stuff are server side right? The items that appear on you are client side? Well, everything must be procesed somehow right? Well, if we had our own server with our own character information (meaning the items we are wearing), couldn't we somehow feed that information to the server? Then walla! We could have full dragon on. This could maybe also be used for what "character rights" you have, and even your skills (except those last two would get you an "insta-ban"). This seems very possible to me, but to some of you more expirienced players will probably disagree. Don't get mad. This idea just occured to me so...without further adoo (how is "Adoo" spelled?) The question is Yes or No?
Questioniar,
~Akriam~

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @maleficus maleficus
item.description:
@maleficus wrote:

you want to trade with someone server check if they are near you and if they want to trade then you get your trade screen you offer an item server checks if you have the item and displays the amount you have(or the amount you offered) then same thing with other guy then the server checks for both accepts then givesthe confirm screen then you both accept and it switches the items

not quite that easy but that’s the jist of it.

Read full topic

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:17, topic:1665”]wat about my suggestion???

Tell the server that somone traded u and gave u full dragon for free [/QUOTE]

Oh, I know what you mean? You mean tell the server this in an exact string: “Ban me pl0x!1!”

Read full topic

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:17, topic:1665”]wat about my suggestion???

Tell the server that somone traded u and gave u full dragon for free [/QUOTE]

no!!!, do u really think it would be that easy(like paul said)

basically the server is the MASTER

so heres how it works

you want to trade with someone
server check if they are near you and if they want to trade
then you get your trade screen
you offer an item
server checks if you have the item and displays the amount you have(or the amount you offered)
then same thing with other guy
then the server checks for both accepts then givesthe confirm screen
then you both accept and it switches the items

logs are kept of this, and all items that a person has are kept. so trading someone a rune long that you dont have means a ban for both of you(since they think that the other person is with you)

its all hopeless

Read full topic

It’s kind of insulting to the hacking community. If it was this easy, we would have figured it out, really.[/quote]

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @daiki daiki
item.description:
@daiki wrote:

[quote=“kiaz, post:9, topic:1665”][quote]
Had the same idea for exporting my WoW Priv Server char into a file then importing it to a legit server
[/quote]

runescape runs off mysql data base’s i came across this when i was loading the highscores and got a funny lil mysql error

Warning: mysql_fetch_row(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /home/runescape/html/lang/en/runescape/hiscores.ws on line 286[/quote]
That’s for the hiscores only. And I’m pretty sure they use MySQL for the forums and such too.

Still this does not prove they use it in the game servers or login server.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

sorry, its not possible at all, as xerocheez said the client just shows you what the server tells it to show you, the client tells the server nothing about what you have or havent got

Read full topic

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

ya i hate this server, makes it so gay…

if the client had all the control everyone would be full stats, and would be running around with full dragon and shit…

or the more advanced hackers would have items that dont exsist, that would own everyone… and runescape would be boring…

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

well i think whats trying to be done is… to make a secondary server and feed the information from the client to the servers… but that wont work… the server is master, so in effect we would wear full dragon but to everyone we wouldnt be(since they have a regular connection they see everything real)

basically it would just alter our view(i think xerozcheez meant that) so we would wear it but not in the game(just to us)

Read full topic

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff
item.description:
@ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff wrote:

Sounds possible, but not worth the effort for the inevitable perma, and insta, ban.

Im no java scripter, but from what I know its most likely possible. Had the same idea for exporting my WoW Priv Server char into a file then importing it to a legit server. Would have worked except I cant import him server side on a legit server with out admin :mad:

But its possible, atleast I think so.

Read full topic

item.title: ..::Idea::
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Not possible, because if you’ve done servers you’ll release the client is just showing everything, all the server does is tell the client what to show on the screen, the server itself holds everything like that.

Read full topic
